testcase.classname: User is Booking room in adactinhotel webpage
testcase.name: Verifying Booking id in adactinhotel webpage
testcase.system-out: Given User is on adactinhotel application...................................passed When User loging in by entering username and password.......................passed And user enters location, hotels, room-type, noOfRooms , checkin, checkout, adults, child per room and searchHotels.passed And user selects the hotel and clicks continue button.......................passed When user enter "One", "one", "Chennai", "9876543219876543","324" and payment details.passed And user clicks book now button.............................................passed Then validate the booking id................................................passed
